reference.text: containers, casings or accessories for cosmetic substances, e.g. shaving soap, lipstick, make-up A45D34/00, A45D40/00

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the following expression is used with the meaning indicated:-"writing implements" covers pens, pencils, crayons, chalks or like markers for writing or drawing

reference.text: for indicating or recording apparatus G01D15/16

with an intermediate element between the resilient supporting means and the ball

the writing-core being made from wear-resistant substances
